resources.string: Enter your value in minutes. The minimum and the maxim values are 5 and 300 minutes.
Do you want to display this quote as wallpaper?
Do you want to display a %s photo as wallpaper?
Do you want to display this photo as wallpaper?

Long click to display a quote/photo/collection photo as a wallpaper. 

Click to enter in a collection 

Click to view an photo 

Click on the top middle icon to change view to quotes/categories 

Click on the top left icon to change wallpaper
